document.full_text: flamboyant pop star lady gaga has scored her first no. 1 album in the united states after a 99-cent promotion by amazon.com sent the much-hyped release past the rare million-copy mark in its debut week.
document.title: lady gaga album sells 1.1 million copies in first week
lines_and_colors: flamboyant pop star lady gaga has scored her first no. 1 album in the united states after a 99-cent promotion by amazon.com sent the much-hyped release past the rare million-copy mark in its debut week.
